messages.content: You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
What is the return policy for CodeCraft Marketplace?
Items can be returned within 30 days of delivery for a full refund or exchange. Products must be unused and in their original packaging.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
How do I track my order?
You can track your order by logging into your account and viewing your order history, or by using the tracking number provided in your shipment confirmation email.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
What payment methods are accepted on CodeCraft Marketplace?
We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, and other popular payment methods such as Apple Pay and Google Wallet.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
Can I change my shipping address after placing an order?
Yes, you can change your shipping address before the order is shipped. Please contact our customer support team as soon as possible to update your information.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
How do I cancel my order?
To cancel your order, please contact our customer support team with your order number. If the order hasn't been shipped, we will process the cancellation and issue a refund.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
Do you offer international shipping?
Yes, we offer international shipping to many countries. Shipping fees and delivery times may vary based on the destination.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
What should I do if I receive a damaged item?
If you receive a damaged item, please contact our customer support team within 48 hours of delivery with photos of the damage. We will arrange for a replacement or a refund.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
How do I apply a discount code to my order?
You can apply a discount code during checkout. Enter the code in the designated field and click 'Apply' to see the discount reflected in your total.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
Can I get a gift receipt?
Yes, you can request a gift receipt during checkout. The gift receipt will not display prices.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
How do I reset my account password?
To reset your password, go to the login page and click 'Forgot Password'. Follow the instructions to receive a password reset link via email.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
What is the estimated delivery time?
Estimated delivery times vary depending on your location and the shipping method selected. Generally, it takes 3-7 business days for domestic orders and 7-14 business days for international orders.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
Can I get a refund if the price drops after I purchase?
We do not offer refunds for price drops after purchase. However, you may still return the item within the return policy period for a refund and repurchase at the lower price.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
How do I contact customer support?
You can contact our customer support team via email, phone, or live chat available on our website. Our support team is available 24/7 to assist you.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
Do you offer gift wrapping services?
Yes, we offer gift wrapping services for an additional fee. You can select the gift wrapping option during checkout.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
What should I do if I entered the wrong shipping address?
If you entered the wrong shipping address, please contact our customer support team immediately to update the address. If the order has already been shipped, we may not be able to make changes.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
Can I pre-order items on CodeCraft Marketplace?
Yes, we offer pre-orders for select items. Pre-order items will be shipped as soon as they are available.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
How do I write a product review?
To write a product review, log into your account, go to your order history, and select the product you want to review. Click on 'Write a Review' and submit your feedback.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
Do you offer bulk purchase discounts?
Yes, we offer bulk purchase discounts for large orders. Please contact our sales team for more information and to get a quote.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
Can I use multiple discount codes on one order?
Only one discount code can be applied per order. Discount codes cannot be combined.
You are CodeCraft Marketplace agent to serve customer queries
How do I know if an item is in stock?
Product availability is displayed on the product page. If an item is out of stock, you will have the option to be notified when it becomes available again.
